job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Principal Architect </strong></p><p>Health IQ is a community of engineers who are passionate about building quality software that rewards the health conscious. Our work environment is collaborative and ownership driven, and as a result, we build products that are well-considered and well-architected. Your skillset will grow at Health IQ. You will join a team excited about the problems we solve and the tools they use to solve them.</p><p>What you will be doing:</p><ul><li>Developing new software solutions to improve the efficiencies and observability of the business</li><li>Work with key stakeholders and technical leadership to define solutions to best solve the problem at hand</li><li>Lead development and continuously improve critical subsystems</li><li>Execute the full SDLC including requirements analysis, architecture and design specification, service development, code review, testing and delivery</li></ul><p>Who we're looking for:</p><ul><li>Undergraduate degree in computer science, or related technical field, required; advanced degree preferred</li><li>8+ years of relevant experience</li><li>Technologies</li><li>Frontend: TypeScript/JavaScript, HTML, CSS development and the latest web-frameworks (React, Angular, etc...)</li><li>Backend: Typescript/Node, Ruby, Java, Python or other server-side object-oriented languages. Experience with web frameworks such as Express, Rails, Spring, Django</li><li>Passion for scalability, latency, stability and performance with an innate ability to understand the trade-offs between acceptable offerings and costs</li><li>Self-motivated and self-managed problem solvers able to jump-in to many areas as required</li></ul>
